name: up-grade
effect: Held by Porygon: Evolves the holder into Porygon2 when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Porygon: Holder evolves into Porygon2.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A peculiar box made by SILPH CO.
flavor_text.emerald: A peculiar box made by SILPH CO.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A transparent device filled with all sorts of data. It is made by SILPH CO.
